file_content.text: They've breached the front entrance. It's only a matter of time. Be ready.
Jedi. You befoul the Dark Council with your presence.
You the one in charge here? Before you answer: I was told to kill whoever's in charge here.
This place was already foul. But don't worry, Sith; I have no intention of staying.
It's been conveyed to me that you shouldn't be allowed to leave--not alive, at any rate.
It's all happening, and you can't stop it. I just didn't think I'd have served my purpose so soon....
What are you going on about? What purpose?
That's right; it's over for you, Jedi....
We believe in a cause worth protecting--worth dying for. Let's find out if you can say the same.
So it's happening. I didn't think I'd have served my purpose so soon.
